entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
